sen.j: 国方姫命（くにかたひめのみこと、生没年未詳）は、崇神天皇の皇女。
sen.e: Princess Kunikatahime (Kunikatahime no Mikoto; the dates of her birth and death are unknown) was a princess of the Emperor Sujin.
Princess Kunikatahime (Kunikatahime no Mikoto; the dates of her birth and death are unknown) was a princess of the Emperor Sujin.
Princess Kunikatahime (Kunikatahime no Mikoto; the dates of her birth and death are unknown) was a princess of the Emperor Sujin.
The mother of Princess Kunikatahime was the Empress Mimakihime.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: The mother of Princess Kunikatahime was the Empress Mimakihime.
The mother of Princess Kunikatahime was the Empress Mimakihime.

sen.j: 同母兄に垂仁天皇らがいる。
sen.e: The Emperor Suinin (垂仁天皇) was her (Princess Kunikatahime) maternal brother (the son of the Emperor Sujin).
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: The Emperor Suinin was a maternal half-brother of Princess Kunikatahime
sen.cmt: 同母兄の所を変更しました。
sen.e: The Emperor Suinin was a maternal half-brother of Princess Kunikatahime

sen.j: 異母兄弟に豊城入彦命、八坂入彦命らがいる。
sen.e: The paternal half brothers of Princess Kunikatahime were Prince Toyokiiribiko (豊城入彦命), Prince Yasakairibiko (八坂入彦命), and so on.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: Her paternal half-brothers were Prince Toyokiiribiko, Prince Yasakairibiko, and so on.
sen.cmt: 異母兄弟の所を変更しました。
sen.e: Her paternal half-brothers were Prince Toyokiiribiko, Prince Yasakairibiko, and so on.

sen.j: 実績については、詳しくわかっていない。
sen.e: Details of her (Princess Kunikatahime) achievements are unknown.
Details of her (Princess Kunikatahime) achievements are unknown.
Details of her (Princess Kunikatahime) achievements are unknown.
